subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The race’s overall leader, Alberto Contador, said Andy Schleck, who grew up in Luxembourg with his brother Frank imagining Tour de France victories, was now his greatest threat.
snippet: The race’s overall leader, Alberto Contador, said Andy Schleck, who grew up in Luxembourg with his brother Frank imagining Tour de France victories, was now his greatest threat.
